page.common.copyrightEyesProtocol: Copyright EYES Protocol All rights reserved
page.common.rights.reproductionDesc: Right of Public Performancehave the right to reproduce his/her work.
page.common.rights.performanceDesc: The author shall have the right to perform his/her work publicly.
page.common.rights.publicTransmissionDes: The author shall have the right to transmit his/her work in public.
page.common.rights.broadcastDesc: The right to transmit sound and video or sound and video for the purpose of being simultaneously received by the public during public transmission;
page.common.rights.transmissionDesc: During public transmission, the right to make the work available for use by radio or wire communication so that members of the public can access it at a time and place individually selected.
page.common.rights.digitalVoiceDesc: The right to transmit (other than transmit) sound in a digital manner at the request of a member of the public for the purpose of simultaneous reception by the public during public transmission;
page.common.rights.exhibitionDesc: The author shall have the right to exhibit the original or reproduction of his/her work of art, etc.
page.common.rights.distributionDesc: The author shall have the right to distribute the original or reproduction of his/her work: Provided, That the original or reproduction of the work has been offered to a deal by means of sale, etc. with permission of the relevant holder of author‚Äôs property right, the same shall not apply
page.common.rights.rentalDesc: The author shall have the right to lease the commercial music records or programs for the purpose of profit-making notwithstanding the proviso to Article 20. ¬†<Amended by Act No. 9625, Apr. 22, 2009>
page.common.rights.derivativeWorkDesc: The author shall have the right to produce and utilize a derivative work based on his/her original work.

page.createCompetition.competitionTitle: Application for registration of rights for contest works
page.createCompetition.title1: Consent to reasons for refusal to approve works
page.createCompetition.checkboxTitle: I agree that I have checked the contents.
page.createCompetition.title1.descriptio: 1. Works that reflect excessive sensationalism or violence may be rejected for submission.
2. Works that cause discomfort or disgust to others by inserting excessive profanity and profanity into the work may be rejected for entry.
3. Works that infringe on the rights of others, such as portrait rights, defamation, or copyright infringement, may be restricted from being submitted.
page.createCompetition.title2.descriptio: 1. Issuing NFTs without permission from copyright holders may result in copyright infringement.
2. If the submitted work is a work for which copyright ownership has been transferred in its entirety, the entry of the work may be restricted.
3. The participant is responsible for plagiarizing or stealing other people's work without permission, and the award will be canceled in the event of a legal dispute after the award.
4. TamTam does not take any responsibility for any disputes caused by contest participants' entries, and agrees that the responsibility lies with the participants themselves.
page.createCompetition.title3.descriptio: 1. Information on submitted works (title, description) cannot be modified.
2. The copyright of the submitted work belongs to the author.
3. The screening period and presentation schedule may change according to the organizer's schedule.
4. Taxes and public charges for the prize money are borne by the organizers.

5. We plan to collect personal information such as name, e-mail, and phone number of participants who entered at the time of registration to support the fee required for entry and to announce the screening results.
6. After receiving the necessary Matics for entry from the organizers, if the final entry is not completed, the Matics will be recalled.
7. Owners who purchased the entry may use the original work for non-commercial use without separate permission. (ex. Use as SNS profile image).
8. For the winning entry, only one entry with the highest score will be selected from among entries submitted by participants (up to 3 submissions).
9. If entries do not meet the screening criteria, the number of award winners may be adjusted or not selected.
10. The number of awards in each category may change depending on the status of entries.
11. Submissions can be used for internal and external publicity by the organizer without any modification of the original.
page.createCompetition.firstComplete: The first entry has been completed
page.createCompetition.send: We will send you an approval email after the review is complete!

page.mypage.transactionLog.contractCheck: Copyright Non-Exclusive License Agreement
Author and Licensor
Here in after referred to as ‚Äúright holder‚Äù) and copyright user
(Here in after referred to as ‚Äúuser‚Äù) is the following work
Contracts as follows in relation to permission to use author's property rights.
all
Well
Article 1 (Purpose of the Agreement)
The purpose of this contract is to clarify the rights relationship between the right holder and the user in relation to the permission to use author's property rights.
Article 2 (subject of contract)
The rights subject to permission in this contract are the rights agreed upon by the parties among the author's property rights for the works below (hereinafter referred to as ‚Äútarget works‚Äù).
Title (Title)
Author
Classification
Art Works
Right
Article 3 (Permission Period)
The period of permission for use of the target work shall be from
from some
. However, if the user pays the user fee under Article 5 (2) to the user after
, the starting point of the license period, the license period for the target work shall be calculated from the day after the date the user fee is paid.
to
Article 4 (Obligations of Rightholders)
The rightholder grants the user the right to exploit the copyright property under Article 2 of this Agreement for the subject work in a non-exclusive manner for the period of Article 3.
The holder of the right must deliver substantial data necessary for the use of the target work to the user by

. However, if the subject work is not registered with the Korea Copyright Commission, the licensor fulfills the above obligations after registering the author's property rights of the subject work upon request by the user.
The right holder must notify the user in advance if a third party's right to license or pledge exists in the target work.
If the right holder intends to transfer all or part of the author's property rights of the target work to a third party or establish a pledge, he/she must notify the user in advance.
Article 5 (User Rights and Obligations)
Users can use the subject work freely, non-exclusively, within the scope of permission granted in Article 2 during the license period in Article 3.

The user must pay the usage fee to the user with the following payment method and conditions by the day before the license period of this contract, and this contract requires the user to pay the usage fee to the right holder. It is deemed to have been concluded effectively at the time of payment. If the user does not pay the usage fee within the payment period, the user is deemed to have withdrawn the subscription for this contract.
Payment method
Semen
Lump sum
Payment deadline
until 00:00 the day before the license period of this agreement
If the user intends to transfer the right to use the work to a third party or establish a pledge, the right holder must obtain written consent.
Users must indicate the names of authors and copyright holders when using a work that allows display of names of authors and copyright holders customarily.

The user shall not infringe on the author's moral rights in using the target work. However, within the scope of not changing the essential content of the target work, the right holder is notified in advance of that fact. After that, you can make minor corrections and edits.
Article 6 (Confirmation and Warranties)
The right holder confirms and guarantees the following items to the user.
that you lawfully possess the rights and authority necessary to enter into a copyright license for the subject work
That the content of the target work does not infringe on any rights, including copyright, trademark rights, and personality rights of third parties
That there is no longer any burden that can restrict users' use, other than the right of a third party notified to users in advance about the target work
The user confirms and guarantees the following items to the right holder.
Not allowing the transfer or reuse of the copyrighted work to a third party without the consent of the right holder
Do not use the copyrighted work in a way that infringes on the third party's personal rights including honorary rights
Article 7 (Change of Agreement)

If it is necessary to change some of the contents of this contract, it can be changed by written agreement between the right holder and the user, and unless otherwise specified in the written agreement, the changed matters are It takes effect from the next day.
Article 8 (Termination of Agreement)
Parties may terminate this Agreement if they are unable to maintain the Agreement due to natural disasters or other force majeure.

In the event that the other party violates this Agreement without justifiable reasons, the other party will specify a reasonable period of time and demand correction from the other party, and the other party will not perform within the period. However, if the other party expresses a clear intention to refuse correction or it is clearly recognized that correction is impossible due to the nature of the violation, the contract may be terminated without a demand as above.
The exercise of the right to terminate this contract does not affect the exercise of the right to claim damages against the other party.
Article 9 (Compensation)

If a party violates this Agreement without justifiable reasons, he/she shall be liable for all damages incurred to the other party as a result. However, if this contract is not fulfilled due to the reason of Article 8, Paragraph 1, the liability for damages is exempted.
Article 10 (Payment of Expenses)
The right holder and the user equally bear the cost of concluding the contract.
Article 11 (Dispute Resolution)

For all disputes arising out of this contract, the right holder and the user shall endeavor to reach an amicable agreement. If the dispute is not resolved satisfactorily, the Korea Copyright Commission prior to filing a lawsuit. can apply for mediation.
If it is not resolved according to Paragraph 1, it shall be resolved by litigation in the competent court according to the Civil Procedure Act of the Republic of Korea.
Article 12 (Confidentiality)

Both parties disclose information about the other party, the contents of this contract, and the contents of the subject work that they learned in the process of entering into and fulfilling this contract without the other party's written consent. It should not be disclosed to third parties.
Article 13 (Other Ancillary Agreements)
The right holder and the user may supplement the contents of this contract or prepare an annexed agreement to stipulate matters not specified in this contract.
The annexed agreement under paragraph 1 is valid to the extent that it does not contradict or violate the contents of this Agreement.
Article 14 (interpretation and supplementation of the contract)

If this contract is not specified or there is a difference in interpretation, the copyright law, civil law, etc. shall be applied mutatis mutandis, and the solution will be made in accordance with social conventions and reasoning.
Article 15 (Contract Effective Date)
This contract becomes effective from the date the user pays the usage fee to the right holder in accordance with Article 5, Paragraph 2 of this contract.

page.saleArt.RegistrationOwnershipSale: Registration of sales of NFT works
page.saleArt.sellingText: Selling at a set price without price change
page.saleArt.auctionDisabled: Auction sales are not supported yet,
page.saleArt.auctionDisabled2: please proceed with the fixed price sales listing.
page.saleArt.bidText1: The bid will be awarded at the highest price offered within the period
page.saleArt.bidText2: or sell at the set purchase price
page.saleArt.maximumSales: The maximum sale period that can be set is 15 days.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi1: When registering for sale, your NFT will be sent to the platform contract address for sale.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi2: After registration for sale, it is possible to modify the sales conditions and stop the sale until bidding is made.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi3: If there are no bids during the sale period, the sale will be automatically cancelled.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi4: If the sale is cancelled, the NFT entrusted to the platform contract will be returned to the seller's wallet.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi5: Once the sale is completed, the platform fee and creator royalties are deducted based on the sales price and then settled to the seller.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi6: All sales-related activities are recorded on the blockchain, and during this process, MATIC is generated as a blockchain usage fee.
page.saleArt.noticeTextLi7: If you stop selling or modify the sales conditions after sales registration, additional gas fees will apply, so please check the sales conditions again.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi1: When registering for sale, the holding NFT is sent to the platform contract address for sale.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi2: After registering for sale, you can modify the sales conditions and suspend sales until the bidding takes place.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi13: If there are no bids during the sale period, the sale is automatically canceled.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi4: If the sale is canceled, the NFTs entrusted to the platform contract will be returned to the seller's wallet.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi5: When the sale is complete, the platform fee and creator royalties are deducted based on the sales price, and then settled to the seller.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi6: All activities related to sales are recorded on the blockchain, and in this process, MATIC is generated as a blockchain usage fee.
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi7: - Additional gas fees will be incurred if sales are suspended or sales conditions are modified after sales registration
page.saleArt.auctionNoticeTextLi8: Please check the terms of sale once more.

page.license.text1: The right to temporarily or permanently fix or reproduce a tangible object by printing, photographing, copying, sound recording, recording or other means
page.license.text2: The right of the author to publicly publicize his or her work *Performance - The right to make the work or performance, phonogram, or broadcast public by stage, performance, singing, narration, reading, screening, reproduction, or other means.
page.license.text3: The right to transmit or make available for use by means of radio or wire communication for the purpose of receiving or accessing by the public a work, performance, phonogram, broadcast or database
page.license.text4: The right of the author to exhibit the original or copies of works of art, etc.
page.license.text5: The right of the author to distribute the original work or copies thereof. However, this is not the case when the original copy of the work or its copy is provided for transaction by means of sale, etc. with the permission of the author's right holder.
page.license.text6: The right of the author to rent for profit a sound recording released for commercial purposes or a program released for commercial purposes
page.license.text7: The right to temporarily or permanently fix or reproduce a tangible object by printing, photographing, copying, sound recording, recording or other means
